summary: Completed comprehensive testing of ReWear POS app NEW FEATURES: Settings page with 3 tabs (Preismatrix, Kategorien, Design), Excel download fixed, Danger zone password protection, Custom categories functionality, Color customization for price levels, and 'Unsicher? Google Lens öffnen' button. All major features working correctly.
passed_tests: Backend API all endpoints (20/20 tests passed)
Backend custom categories CRUD operations (add/get/delete)
Backend settings management (colors and password)
Backend price matrix functionality (lookup/download/upload)
Frontend main page loads with category grid and cart
Frontend 'Unsicher? Google Lens öffnen' button works with toast message
Frontend price level buttons show custom colors (Luxus=yellow, Teuer=blue, Mittel=green, Günstig=gray)
Frontend Settings page accessible via settings link
Frontend Settings page has 3 tabs: Preismatrix, Kategorien, Design
Frontend Preismatrix tab: Excel download/upload buttons functional
Frontend Preismatrix tab: Danger zone with 'Alle Fixpreise löschen' and 'Passwort setzen' buttons
Frontend Kategorien tab: 'Eigene Kategorien' section with input field
Frontend Kategorien tab: 'Hinzufügen' button for adding custom categories
Frontend Kategorien tab: Shows standard categories list (17 categories)
Frontend Design tab: 'Farben anpassen' section with 4 color inputs
Frontend Design tab: Color pickers for Luxus, Teuer, Mittel, Günstig
Frontend Design tab: Hex color text inputs and Reset buttons
Frontend Excel download functionality works (no more about:blank issue)
Frontend tab switching works correctly between all 3 tabs
Frontend navigation between main page and settings works

success_percentage.frontend: 95% (19/20 features working, custom category grid integration not fully verified)
